duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee and improve operations of the deductions team through customer and client account set up and maintenance, processing invoices, clearing customer deductions, resolving missed payments, and supervising staff.
Supervise and coordinate daily activity of deductions department.
Establish guidelines for quality work and review systems to improve workflow.
Provide feedback to associates on performance and propose staffing needs.
Maintain detailed working knowledge of overall clients’ policies and procedures and conform to these requirements.
Hire, train, develop, supervise, evaluate, and establish work schedules of deduction team.
Communicate customer policy changes or new policy guidelines and create a collaborative work environment.
Provide back up for deduction analysts as necessary due to absence or surge work.

education_certification.credential: Business degree preferred, equivalent work experience considered
Three years’ experience in a supervisory role
